title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
notes:
Working: main menu, starting new game, opening dialog, controlling character, and using in game menus.
Not working: opening cut scene (black screen, have to click to get to main menu), probably other cut scenes.

title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
notes: Perfect performance. No movies, but this is not a problem: you can watch them from the game folder with mpv.

title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
notes: Get black screen for cutscenes, need to skip by clicking or hitting escape

Everything worked perfectly. Even the save games from windows. Ran around town and did one combat. WIndow mode at lower res stuttered a bit but fullscreen at 1440p worked perfect. All sounds and music where there too. Reaching the start screen took some time though so be a little bit patient when the screen is black.
